info.title: Expensya
info.description: Expensya is a leading Spend Management solution in Europe, and this connector allows to build on top of our technology, automate integration to third party systems, and extend existing features.

get.description: This API returns the image of the expense as Stream. The image can be jpg, jpeg, png or pdf. The type of the image is mentioned in the expense object property "FileType".

parameters.name: expenseId
parameters.description: Format - guid. Unique identifier of the expense.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Format - guid. Unique identifier of the expense.

401.description: The expensya token is invalid or has expired.

403.description: The expensya token has no right to get the image.
